TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract _CommandBarButton implements class Microsoft.Office.Core.CommandBarControl

summary.span: 代表命令栏中的一个按钮控件。

span.span: Represents a button control on a command bar.

span.para: 使用控件()，其中为控件，可返回一个CommandBarButton对象的索引编号。(控件属性必须msoControlButton。)
还可以使用方法可返回一个CommandBarButton对象。
Use Controls(), where is the index number of the control, to return a CommandBarButton object. (The property of the control must be msoControlButton.)
You can also use the method to return a CommandBarButton object.

summary.span: 返回或设置一个值，指示是否指定的命令栏控件将显示一组控件的命令栏上的开头。

span.span: Returns or sets a value that indicates if the specified command bar control appears at the beginning of a group of controls on the command bar.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BuiltIn As Boolean
public: property bool BuiltIn { bool get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个值，指示指定的命令栏控件是否内置控件的容器应用程序。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates if the specified command bar control is a built-in control of the container application.

span.para: 返回True如果指定的命令栏或命令栏控件的内置命令栏或控件的容器应用程序和False如果它是一个自定义命令栏或控件，或者它内置控制其属性已设置.

Returns True if the specified command bar or command bar control is a built-in command bar or control of the container application, and False if it's a custom command bar or control, or if it's a built-in control whose property has been set.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool BuiltInFace { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个值，指示命令栏按钮控件的表面是其原始内置图标。

span.span: Returns or sets a value that indicates if the face of a command bar button control is its original built-in face.

span.para: 此属性仅可设置为True，这将图符重新设置为内置的图标。
This property can only be set to True, which will reset the face to the built-in face.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Core.CommandBarControl Copy([in]object Bar, [in]object Before) runtime managed
Public Function Copy (Optional Bar As Object, Optional Before As Object) As CommandBarControl

param.name: Bar

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 一个数字，指示新控件的命令栏上的位置。

span.span: A number that indicates the position for the new control on the command bar.

param.span: 将位于此位置的控件之前插入新的控件。

span.span: The new control will be inserted before the control at this position.

param.span: 如果省略此参数，控件将被复制到的命令栏的末尾。

span.span: If this argument is omitted, the control is copied to the end of the command bar.

param.name: Before

span.span: Optional Object.
A object that represents the destination command bar.

param.span: 如果省略此参数，控件将被复制到命令栏控件已存在。

span.span: If this argument is omitted, the control is copied to the command bar where the control already exists.

span.span: Copies a command bar control to an existing command bar.

summary.span: 将命令栏按钮控件的图标复制到“剪贴板”中。

span.span: Copies the face of a command bar button control to the Clipboard.

span.para: 使用方法粘贴到一个按钮图标剪贴板的内容。
Use the method to paste the contents of the Clipboard onto a button face.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Creator As Integer
public: property int Creator { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个值，指示在其中创建指定的对象的应用程序。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates the application in which the specified object was created.

remarks.span:
如果指定的对象在 Microsoft Word 中创建的此属性返回 1297307460，后者表示字符串"MSWD";如果在 Microsoft Excel 中创建，此属性返回 1480803660。也可以通过在 Word 中，常量wdCreatorCode或 Excel 中的xlCreatorCode表示此值。主要设计
Creator属性用于 Macintosh，其中每个应用程序具有四个字符的创建者代码。例如，Microsoft Word 具有 MSWD 的创建者代码。有关此属性的其他信息，请咨询的语言参考 Microsoft Office Macintosh Edition 中包含的帮助。
Creator属性始终返回活动应用程序的数字标识符，就像Application属性将始终返回字符串形式的活动应用程序的名称。使用CreatedBy属性， ， ，和对象返回的人员创建这些对象的名称。使用文档属性可返回 Office 文档的作者信息。

span.para: If the specified object was created in Microsoft Word, this property returns 1297307460, which represents the string "MSWD"; if created in Microsoft Excel, this property returns 1480803660. This value can also be represented by the constant wdCreatorCode in Word, or xlCreatorCode in Excel.

The Creator property was primarily designed to be used on the Macintosh, where each application has a four-character creator code. For example, Microsoft Word has the creator code MSWD. For additional information about this property, consult the language reference Help included with Microsoft Office Macintosh Edition.

The Creator property always returns the numeric identifier for the active application, just as the Application property always returns the name of the active application in string form. Use the CreatedBy property of the , , , and objects to return the name of the individual who created those objects. Use document properties to return information about the authors of Office documents.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Delete([in]object Temporary) runtime managed
Public Sub Delete (Optional Temporary As Object)

param.name: Temporary

span.span: Optional Object.
True to delete the control for the current session.

span.span: The application will display the control again in the next session.

summary.span: 从其集合中删除指定的对象。

span.span: Deletes the specified object from its collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DescriptionText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个命令栏控件的说明。

span.span: Returns or sets the description for a command bar control.

span.para: 说明不显示给用户，但其可用于其他开发人员控件行为归档。
气球帮助在 Macintosh 上为使用此属性。
The description is not displayed to the user, but it can be useful for documenting the behavior of the control for other developers.
This property is used for Balloon Help on the Macintosh.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Enabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个值，指示是否启用指定的命令栏控件。

span.span: Returns or sets a value that indicates if the specified command bar control is enabled.

span.para: 如果将Enabled属性设置为True时，应用程序确定命令栏控件; 的状态设置为False将强制要禁用的控件。
If you set the Enabled property to True, the application determines the state of the command bar control; setting it to False will force the control to be disabled.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Execute() runtime managed

summary.span: 运行的过程或内置命令分配给指定的命令栏控件。

span.span: Runs the procedure or built-in command assigned to the specified command bar control.

span.para: 对于自定义控件，使用属性指定要运行的过程。
For custom controls, use the property to specify the procedure to be run.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int FaceId { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个命令栏按钮控件的表面的 ID 号。

span.span: Returns or sets the ID number for the face of a command bar button control.

span.para: FaceId属性指示查找，不的函数，命令栏按钮。
属性对象确定按钮的功能。
与自定义图标的命令栏按钮，其 FaceId属性的值为 0 （零）。
The FaceId property dictates the look, not the function, of a command bar button.
The property of the object determines the function of the button.
The value of the FaceId property for a command bar button with a custom face is 0 (zero).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Height { int get(); void set(int value); };

span.span: Returns or sets the height of a command bar control.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int HelpContextId { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置附加到命令栏控件的帮助主题的帮助上下文 ID 号。

span.span: Returns or sets the Help context ID number for the Help topic attached to the command bar control.

span.para: 若要使用此属性，则必须设置属性。SHIFT + F1 响应帮助主题。
To use this property, you must also set the property. Help topics respond to SHIFT+F1.

To use this property, you must also set the property. Help topics respond to the user pressing SHIFT+F1.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Id As Integer
public: property int Id { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个内置命令栏控件的 ID。

span.span: Returns the ID for a built-in command bar control.

span.para: 控件的 ID 决定了该控件的内置操作。所有自定义控件的Id属性值为 1。
A control's ID determines the built-in action for that control. The value of the Id property for all custom controls is 1.

The position of the first command bar control is 1. Separators are not counted in the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsPriorityDropped As Boolean
public: property bool IsPriorityDropped { bool get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个值，指示该控件当前是否已删除从菜单或工具栏根据使用统计信息和布局空间。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates if the control is currently dropped from the menu or toolbar based on usage statistics and layout space.

remarks.span:
请注意返回的值不表示与由设置控件的可见性属性。如果IsPriorityDropped为True不立即可见个性化的菜单或工具栏上的控件可见性设置为True 。若要确定时到集IsPriorityDropped为True的特定菜单项，Microsoft Office 维护总数的次数用该菜单项和在其中用户具有不同的应用程序会话的数量的记录的
无需使用的特定菜单项，在为此菜单项，相同的菜单中使用另一个菜单项。当此值到达一定的阈值时，会减少使用次数。当计数为零时， IsPriorityDropped设置为True。程序员无法设置会话值、 阈值值或IsPriorityDropped属性。但是，可以使用程序员属性禁用应用程序中的特定菜单的自适应菜单。
，以确定何时为特定的工具栏控件，设置为True的IsPriorityDropped Office 维护一组中的所有已上次执行该工具栏上的控件的顺序。工具栏将始终显示尽可能多的控件，因为它具有空间来显示，请顺序最近用于最近最少使用。控件替换将始终显示设为 1 和工具栏将换行，如有必要，显示这些控件。编程人员可以使用Priority属性，以确保始终显示特定的工具栏上的控件，或重新定位工具栏，以便他们具有足够空间来显示所有的控件。
您可以使用下表预测其个性化菜单上的菜单项将仍可见之前菜单项的IsPriorityDropped属性设置为True的会话的数目。
3
6
9
12
17
23
29
31

span.para: Note that the returned value does not represent the control's visibility, as set by the property. A control with Visible set to True will not be immediately visible on a personalized menu or toolbar if IsPriorityDropped is True.

To determine when to set IsPriorityDropped to True for a specific menu item, Microsoft Office maintains a total count of the number of times the menu item was used and a record of the number of different application sessions in which the user has used another menu item in the same menu as this menu item, without using the specific menu item. When this value reaches certain threshold values, the count is decremented. When the count reaches zero, IsPriorityDropped is set to True. Programmers cannot set the session value, the threshold value, or the IsPriorityDropped property. Programmers can, however, use the property to disable adaptive menus for specific menus in an application.

To determine when to set IsPriorityDropped to True for a specific toolbar control, Office maintains a list of the order in which all the controls on that toolbar were last executed. A toolbar will always show as many controls as it has space to show, in the order of most recently used to least recently used. Controls with set to 1 will always be shown and the toolbar will wrap rows, if necessary, to show these controls. Programmers can use the Priority property to ensure that specific toolbar controls are always shown, or to reposition toolbars so that they have enough space to display all of their controls.
You can use the following table to predict the number of sessions for which a menu item on a personalized menu will remain visible before the menu item's IsPriorityDropped property is set to True.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Left As Integer
public: property int Left { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个值，指示相对于屏幕左边缘的指定的命令栏控件的水平位置 （以像素为单位）。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates the horizontal position of the specified command bar control (in pixels) relative to the left edge of the screen.

span.para: 本主题中的内容的一些可能不适用于某些语言版本。
Some of the content in this topic may not be applicable to some languages.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property stdole::IPictureDisp ^ Mask { stdole::IPictureDisp ^ get(); void set(stdole::IPictureDisp ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个IPictureDisp对象，表示的掩码图像对象。

span.span: Returns or sets an IPictureDisp object that represents the mask image of a object.

span.para: 掩码映像确定是透明的按钮图像部分。
时创建您计划使用作为掩码图像的图像，所有要透明区域应该为白色，您想要显示的区域的所有应为黑色。
始终的图片后设置掩码对象。
The mask image determines what parts of the button image are transparent.
When you create an image that you plan on using as a mask image, all of the areas that you want to be transparent should be white, and all of the areas that you want to show should be black.
Always set the mask after you have set the picture for a object.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Office.Core.CommandBarControl Move (object Bar, object Before);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Core.CommandBarControl Move([in]object Bar, [in]object Before) runtime managed
Public Function Move (Optional Bar As Object, Optional Before As Object) As CommandBarControl

param.name: Bar
param.span: 表示控件位置的数字。控件将插到该位置的控件之前。如果忽略该参数，控件插入到同一命令栏。

span.span: A number that indicates the position for the control. The control is inserted before the control currently occupying this position. If this argument is omitted, the control is inserted on the same command bar.

param.name: Before
param.span: A对象，表示目标命令栏控件。

span.span: A object that represents the destination command bar for the control.

param.span: 如果省略此参数，则该控件移到当前所在的命令栏的末尾。

span.span: If this argument is omitted, the control is moved to the end of the command bar where the control currently resides.

summary.span: 将指定的命令栏控件移动到已有的命令栏。

span.span: Moves the specified command bar control to an existing command bar.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoControlOLEUsage OLEUsage { Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoControlOLEUsage get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoControlOLEUsage value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置的 OLE 客户端和 OLE 服务器角色合并两个 Microsoft Office 应用程序时，则将使用在其中一个命令栏控件。

span.span: Returns or sets the OLE client and OLE server roles in which a command bar control will be used when two Microsoft Office applications are merged.

span.para: 旨在，可以与其他 Office 应用程序合并时在 Office 应用程序中指定如何单个外接程序应用程序的命令栏控件将表示该属性。如果在客户端和服务器实现了命令栏，客户端控件的控件中嵌入的命令栏控件。
自定义这些控件标记为只客户端 （或既不客户端和服务器） 将从服务器，和控件标记为只服务器 （或既不服务器和客户端） 中删除会丢弃客户端中。合并的其余控件。
如果合并的应用程序之一不是 Office 应用程序，常规 OLE 菜单合并则使用，该控制通过属性。

This property is intended to allow you to specify how individual add-in applications' command bar controls will be represented in one Office application when it is merged with another Office application. If both the client and server implement command bars, the command bar controls are embedded in the client control by control.

Custom controls marked as client-only (or neither client nor server) are dropped from the server, and controls marked as server-only (or neither server nor client) are dropped from the client. The remaining controls are merged.
If one of the merging applications isn't an Office application, normal OLE menu merging is used, which is controlled by the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ OnAction { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置在用户单击或更改命令栏控件的值时将运行 Visual Basic 过程的名称。

span.span: Returns or sets the name of a Visual Basic procedure that will run when the user clicks or changes the value of a command bar control.

span.para: 容器应用程序确定的值是否为合法的宏名。
The container application determines whether the value is a valid macro name.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Parameter { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个值，应用程序可用于执行命令。

span.span: Returns or sets a value that an application can use to execute a command.

span.para: 如果指定的参数设置为内置控件，该应用程序可以修改它的默认行为，如果它可以分析和使用新值。如果该参数设置为自定义控件、 它可以用于将信息发送到 Visual Basic 过程，或可用于保留有关控件的信息 (类似于第二个属性值)。

If the specified parameter is set for a built-in control, the application can modify its default behavior if it can parse and use the new value. If the parameter is set for custom controls, it can be used to send information to Visual Basic procedures, or it can be used to hold information about the control (similar to a second property value).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Parent As CommandBar
public: property Microsoft::Office::Core::CommandBar ^ Parent { Microsoft::Office::Core::CommandBar ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个值，指示指定的对象的父对象。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates the parent object for the specified object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void PasteFace() runtime managed

summary.span: 粘贴到指定命令栏按钮控件剪贴板的内容。

span.span: Pastes the contents of the Clipboard onto a command bar button control.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property stdole::IPictureDisp ^ Picture { stdole::IPictureDisp ^ get(); void set(stdole::IPictureDisp ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个IPictureDisp对象，该对象表示的图像对象。

span.span: Returns or sets an IPictureDisp object representing the image of a object.

span.para: 更改按钮的图像时，您还需要使用属性来设置屏蔽图像。屏蔽图像确定按钮图像的哪些部分是透明的。始终的图片后设置掩码对象。

When you change the image on a button, you will also want to use the property to set a mask image. The mask image determines which parts of the button image are transparent. Always set the mask after you have set the picture for a object.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Priority { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个命令栏控件的优先级。

span.span: Returns or sets the priority of a command bar control.

span.para: A 控件的优先级来确定是否控件可以删除从停靠的命令栏中，是否命令栏控件不能容纳单个行中。无法容纳单个行中的控件放置从右到左的命令栏。
有效优先级号码为 0 （零） 到 7，默认值为 3。1 表示无法从工具栏中删除该控件的优先级。其他优先级值将被忽略。
菜单项的命令栏控件不使用Priority属性。

A control's priority determines whether the control can be dropped from a docked command bar if the command bar controls can't fit in a single row. Controls that can't fit in a single row drop off command bars from right to left.
Valid priority numbers are 0 (zero) through 7 and the default value is 3. A priority of 1 means that the control cannot be dropped from a toolbar. Other priority values are ignored.
The Priority property is not used by command bar controls that are menu items.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Reset() runtime managed

summary.span: 将内置命令栏控件重置为其初始功能和图符。

span.span: Resets a built-in command bar control to its original function and face.

span.para: 重置一个内置控件将恢复该控件原来的操作，并将每个控件的属性重置回其原始状态。内置命令栏重置删除自定义控件并恢复内置控件。

Resetting a built-in control restores the actions originally intended for the control and resets each of the control's properties back to its original state. Resetting a built-in command bar removes custom controls and restores built-in controls.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetFocus() runtime managed

summary.span: 将键盘焦点移动到指定的命令栏控件。

span.span: Moves the keyboard focus to the specified command bar control.

span.para: 控件被禁用，或不可见，如果此方法将失败。
控件上的重点是不明显。使用此方法后，您会注意到三个维度突出显示在控件上的。按箭头键将具有到达控件按键盘控制导航的工具栏中中,。
If the control is disabled or isn't visible, this method will fail.

The focus on the control is subtle. After you use this method, you will notice a three dimensional highlight on the control. Pressing the arrow keys will navigate in the toolbars, as if you had arrived at the control by pressing only keyboard controls.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ShortcutText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置时菜单、 子菜单或快捷菜单上显示按钮旁边的按钮控件显示快捷键文本。

span.span: Returns or sets the shortcut key text displayed next to a button control when the button appears on a menu, submenu, or shortcut menu.

span.para: 您可以设置该属性仅对包含的命令栏按钮宏。
You can set this property only for command bar buttons that contain an macro.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoButtonState State { Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoButtonState get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoButtonState value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个命令栏按钮控件的外观。

span.span: Returns or sets the appearance of a command bar button control.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoButtonStyle Style { Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoButtonStyle get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoButtonStyle value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个命令栏按钮控件的显示的方式。

span.span: Returns or sets the way a command bar button control is displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Tag { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置命令栏控件，如可用作在过程中，参数的数据或标识的控件的信息的信息。

span.span: Returns or sets the information about the command bar control, such as data that can be used as an argument in procedures, or information that identifies the control.

span.para: 若要避免与事件触发时在同一个类的重复调用，定义的事件的唯一的Tag属性。
To avoid duplicate calls of the same class when triggered with events, define the Tag property unique to the events.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TooltipText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个命令栏控件的屏幕提示中显示的文本。

span.span: Returns or sets the text displayed in a command bar control's ScreenTip.

span.para: 默认情况下的值属性用作屏幕提示。
By default, the value of the property is used as the ScreenTip.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Top As Integer
public: property int Top { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回从指定的命令栏控件的上边缘到屏幕的上边缘的距离 （以像素为单位）。

span.span: Returns the distance (in pixels) from the top edge of the specified command bar control to the top edge of the screen.

span.para: 本主题中的内容的一些可能不适用于某些语言版本。
Some of the content in this topic may not be applicable to some languages.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Type As MsoControlType
public: property Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoControlType Type { Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoControlType get(); };

summary.span: 返回命令栏控件的类型。

span.span: Returns the type of command bar control.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Visible { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个值，指示指定的对象是否可见。

span.span: Returns or sets a value that indicates if the specified object is visible.

span.para: 某些本主题中的内容不可能适用于某些语言版本。
Visible属性对于新创建的自定义命令栏是False默认。
之前的 visible 属性设置为True的命令栏的属性必须设置为True 。
Some of the content in this topic may not be applicable to some languages.
The Visible property for newly created custom command bars is False by default.
The property for a command bar must be set to True before the visible property is set to True.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Width { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置指定的命令栏控件的宽度 （以像素为单位）。

span.span: Returns or sets the width (in pixels) of the specified command bar control.
